game.name: One Shot Challenge
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Grab your gun and pan and battle insane food enemies! With only one bullet per run, rescue your family and stop the evil Mr. Burrito.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Grab your gun and pan and battle insane food enemies! With only one bullet per run, rescue your family and stop the evil Mr. Burrito.
